titles: The city-night-cap, or, Crede quod habes a tragi-comedy / by Robert Davenport ; as it was acted with great applause by Her Majesties servants at the Phoenix in Drury Lane.
author: Davenport, Robert, fl. 1623.
publisher: Printed by Ja. Cottrel, for Samuel Speed ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
